page.title: 08THE BUS STATION
page.content: There are 25 bus routes from Worksop bus station. Most buses have only a driver who also takes the fares. There are only six conductors now at the Worksop bus station. The buses run on diesel and together they use about 900 gallons a day. The life span of a bus is seven years. The tyres are rented and the company pay for the tread used. There are 53 buses based at Worksop. Ten are out of use each day for servicing and repairs. The drivers work shifts, one week on days and one week afternoons and evenings. They are paid on Fridays and have to belong to a union.
